title: Open-science model for drug discovery expands to neurodegenerative diseases

title_detail.value: Open-science model for drug discovery expands to neurodegenerative diseases

summary: Parkinson's disease and Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis are the newest frontiers for open science drug discovery, a global movement led by academic scientists that puts knowledge sharing and medication affordability ahead of patents and profits.

summary_detail.value: Parkinson's disease and Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis are the newest frontiers for open science drug discovery, a global movement led by academic scientists that puts knowledge sharing and medication affordability ahead of patents and profits.
